contents.html:
Bab Initiative is more than just a community centerâ€”itâ€™s a space where people connect, learn, and grow together. Since our journey began in 2021, we have been dedicated to creating inclusive and accessible opportunities for everyone, offering a wide range of cultural, educational, and social activities.

Our core values are inclusion, kindness, and community spirit. Here, everyone is welcome regardless of background, nationality, or social status. Together, we create a space where everyone can contribute, learn, and grow. ðŸ’›

Everything you see at Bab is made possible by a small team of passionate volunteers who give their time, skills, and energy to bring this space to life. No salaries, no profitsâ€”just people working together to make something special. But to keep Bab Initiative running, we need your support. Every contribution, big or small, helps us cover essential costs like rent, supplies, and maintenance, allowing us to continue offering a welcoming space for all

code.html:
Support Bab Initiative â€“ Be Part of Something Meaningful

{@html contents.html}

How You Can Help

  • Make a one-time contribution
  • Set up a monthly donation to support our project
  • Provide materials or resources for activities

Your support makes a real difference. Together, we can keep Bab Initiative thriving and continue building a stronger, more connected community.

Keeping Bab Initiative Alive â€“ The Reality Behind the Scenes

Bab Initiative exists because of the passion and dedication of its volunteersâ€”but passion alone doesn't pay the bills. Running a community center comes with real, unavoidable expenses:

Rent

Keeping our doors open means securing a space where everyone can gather, learn, and share.

Utilities

Electricity, water, etc.â€”basic needs that keep Bab running every day.

Administration

Legal fees, permits, and other behind-the-scenes costs to keep us official and operational.

Supplies & Maintenance

From chairs and pencils, to cleaning products and toilet paperâ€”every detail matters.

So far, these expenses have been carried almost entirely by the founders, as Bab Initiative does not yet receive any grants or external financial support. We operate on a simple reality: if we don't cover these costs, Bab cannot continue to exist.

This is where you come in. Your supportâ€”no matter the amountâ€”helps share the load and ensures that Bab remains a welcoming space for all.

Every little bit counts. Let's keep Bab alive, together.

Monthly Expenses: {formatCurrency(monthlyGoal)}

{#each expenses as expense, i}
{/each}
{#each expenses as expense, i}
{expense.category}: {expense.percentage}%
{/each}
{formatCurrency(monthlyRaised)} raised {formatCurrency(monthlyGoal)} goal

Our First Project â€“ More Cushions for Lojong Meditation

Our Lojong Meditation sessions have been a great success, bringing people together for moments of peace and mindfulness. But with this success comes a challengeâ€”we need more cushions to accommodate everyone comfortably!

To double our capacity, we aim to make 15 large cushions and 10 small ones. We've already received a quotation from a small artisan in Maadi (the same talented hands that crafted our current cushions), and the total cost for this project is 2,000 EGP.

  • Purpose: Support a local artisan while making meditation accessible to more people.
  • Goal: Raise the 2,000 EGP by the end of May.

If you've enjoyed our meditation sessions or simply believe in the power of creating a peaceful space for the community, this is your chance to contribute!

Every contribution brings us closer to making this happen!

{formatCurrency(cushionsRaised)} raised {formatCurrency(cushionsGoal)} goal

Bablio â€“ Expanding Our Library!

At Bab Initiative, we believe that books open doors to new worlds, ideas, and opportunities. Our Bablio group is dedicated to making reading accessible to all, and we are proud to have over 665 books, in English, French, German, Arabic, Spanish, available for our community!

Recently, thanks to generous donations, our collection has grown significantly. But to truly make these books available, we need more storage space!

Our Goal: A Bigger & Better Library

Our current shelves were bought second-hand in 2021 for 2,000 EGP. Now, it's time to expand!

  • We plan to add 10 shelves to accommodate more books.
  • We found a great option at IKEA: IVAR Shelf - Pine (matching our current library)
  • Total cost: 750 EGP x 10 = 7,500 EGP
  • Target date: End of May

Let's keep Bablio growing and offer even more opportunities for adventure, learning, and inspiration! âœ¨

{formatCurrency(libraryRaised)} raised {formatCurrency(libraryGoal)} goal

Make a Donation

Your contribution will help keep Bab Initiative alive and thriving.

Monthly Operations

Help us cover our basic monthly expenses

Meditation Cushions

Support our meditation project

Library Expansion

Help us expand our book collection

Alternative Ways to Help

If you know someone willing to sell or donate second-hand shelves, or if you have materials that could be useful for our activities, please let us know!

Contact Us

Have questions about our fundraising efforts or want to learn more about Bab Initiative?

Or email us at: info@babinitiative.org
